description: User asks StyleMate for sunglasses that match their summer dresses. StyleMate lists the wardrobe, clarifies which dress the user wants, checks current trends, and returns three curated sunglasses options with purchase links.

messages.content: You are StyleMate, an agentic personal stylist. You can access the user's wardrobe, fashion trends, weather, body measurements, and can generate outfit suggestions or find purchase links. Use the provided tools when needed and always respond in a helpful, friendly tone.
Hey StyleMate, I need a pair of sunglasses that would match my summer dresses. Can you suggest something?
Sure! Let me take a look at the summer dresses you have in your wardrobe so I can find sunglasses that complement them.

{"items": [{"id": "item_101", "name": "Yellow Floral Sundress", "category": "dresses", "color": "yellow"}, {"id": "item_102", "name": "Navy Striped Maxi Dress", "category": "dresses", "color": "navy"}, {"id": "item_103", "name": "White Eyelet Midi Dress", "category": "dresses", "color": "white"}, {"id": "item_201", "name": "Denim Shorts", "category": "bottoms", "color": "blue"}]}

I see you have three summer dresses:
1. **Yellow Floral Sundress**
2. **Navy Striped Maxi Dress**
3. **White Eyelet Midi Dress**
Which one are you planning to wear with the sunglasses? If you’re not sure, let me know a style vibe you like (e.g., “vintage”, “minimalist”, “bold colors”).
I’m thinking about the Yellow Floral Sundress for a garden party this Saturday.

Great choice! A garden party calls for sunny, fresh looks. I’ll look for sunglasses that complement the yellow floral pattern and keep the vibe light and playful. Give me a moment while I search our partnered stores.

arguments.query: yellow floral themed sunglasses or pastel pink cat-eye sunglasses to match yellow floral dress

messages.content: {"results": [{"title": "Ray‑Ban Round Metal Sunglasses in Pastel Pink", "price": 145, "retailer": "Ray‑Ban Official Store", "url": "https://www.ray-ban.com/us/sunglasses/round-metal-pink"}, {"title": "Warby Parker Cat‑Eye Sunglasses in Soft Yellow", "price": 125, "retailer": "Warby Parker", "url": "https://www.warbyparker.com/eyeglasses/cat-eye-soft-yellow"}, {"title": "Maui Jim Hula Classic Polarized Sunglasses – Light Gold", "price": 139, "retailer": "Maui Jim", "url": "https://www.mauijim.com/us/en/sunglasses/hula-classic-light-gold"}]}

Here are three sunglasses that will look wonderful with your **Yellow Floral Sundress** for the garden party:

1. **Ray‑Ban Round Metal Sunglasses in Pastel Pink** – The soft pink frame picks up the floral accents while keeping the look fresh. $145 – [Buy here](https://www.ray-ban.com/us/sunglasses/round-metal-pink)
2. **Warby Parker Cat‑Eye Sunglasses in Soft Yellow** – A classic cat‑eye shape in a matching yellow hue for a coordinated vibe. $125 – [Buy here](https://www.warbyparker.com/eyeglasses/cat-eye-soft-yellow)
3. **Maui Jim Hula Classic Polarized Sunglasses – Light Gold** – Light gold lenses add a subtle sheen that complements the sunny yellow without overpowering the dress. $139 – [Buy here](https://www.mauijim.com/us/en/sunglasses/hula-classic-light-gold)

All three are under $150 and come from reputable brands. Let me know which pair you like best, or if you’d like to see more options!
